document_data.name: Giles Wormack
document_data.mainbody: '''Giles Wormack''' was a human boy during the late 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during the [[orc]] and [[drow]] assault on the [[Silver Marches]], Giles lived with his sister [[Karolina Wormack]] in [[Sundabar]]. They assisted knight-commander [[Aleina Brightlance]] with her speech just before the fall of the city.
